with regular and thoughtful maintenance; protection; and cleaning.#description##the vehicle is torreador red metallic over black cloth interior with the sync & sun package (microsoft sync with bluetooth; usb; aux; voice commands; etc.  power glass moonroof) and towing package (transmission oil cooler; trailer wiring; and hitch receiver). it has the 3.0 liter v6 engine with 240 hp and 223 ft-lbs. of torque connected to the 6-speed automatic ford 6f35 transmission and full-time awd.#maintenance##the following maintenance has been performed:#-oil and filter changes performed per the vehicles oil life monitor; oil and filter changed recently.#-automatic transmission fluid drain and fill at 50k miles and 69k miles with recommended mercon lv fluid#-rear diff fluid drain and fill at 50k miles#-spark plugs including new intake manifold gaskets at 60k miles#-new michelin premier ltx tires (not shown in photos; replaced a few days ago). the top of the line tire choice for this size and use!#-new ac compressor; blower motor resister; ac compressor resistor; and recharge. oem system failed due to ac compressor resistor failing leading to a high-pressure situation in the system. the entire system has been replaced with all oem parts by a reputable independent shop (renson automotive; campbell) and the underlying issue that caused the failure was addressed.#-brake fluid freshly flushed last week with bosch dot 5.1 fluid (back-compatible with dot 3 and 4 systems; but higher resistance to temperature and brake fade)#-cloth seats steam-cleaned and fabric-guarded once per year (most recently last week)#-clean smog in hand and ready to sell#minor mods##-tinted windows from previous owner; approximately 35% transmittance on rear seat windows and 20% transmittance on cargo area glass; front side windows and windshield appear stock. does a great job at keeping the heat out!#-ford motorcraft accessory mud splash guards#-full weathertech mat set including cargo mat; including windshield sunshade.#-installed two cargo holddowns in the trunk area (car came without any holddowns or attachment points stock)#niggles##-the car has an outstanding recall notice from ford (ford seems to take awhile to getting recall parts in to dealers) to fix something in the fuel delivery system; parts are not available yet; i will provide the recall notice letter to the buyer.#-someone turned left into the lower right rear door with their fender at low speeds. its an indiscrete scuff (look for it in the photos!) and i never got it fixed. i personally dont think its worse than the...#-quarter-sized door ding on the driver door under the handle. that was from a previous owner.#-gen 1 sync will crash on you occasionally; and i will want to show the buyer which fuse to pull and reset when its being particularly tempermental...that said; ive generally been impressed with its overall reliability vs its reputation; and its nice to have good bluetooth for hands-free phone and streaming audio; aux in; and a powered usb port and input for other devices...i use it to run a gen 7 ipod classic. i dont know if it does or does not work with other devices; but youre free to bring your device and cable along on a test drive and we can try it :)

TITLE: ford escape 2006 for adventurers (updated)
ATTR: condition: excellent#drive: 4wd#fuel: gas#odometer: 86000#paint color: silver#size: mid-size#title status: clean#transmission: automatic#type: SUV
MESSAGE: update: to sweeten the deal; the car serviced the car; got new tags and emission inspection!#also; the fact this car is below 100k miles may help to get you a better deal with the bank##hi there#this is a car for adventurers. people who does not care for potholes or snow piles; or heavy rain. if you like to hit the road; maybe with your bike; or you have a dog or your kids; this may be the car for you. wheter going to the poconos in winter or to the shore in summer; this is how you will get there. low maintenance and ready to go.#gently used by the previous owner (worked in the ford dealership in town) and then by me for adventures for the last 20k miles; this car has been fantastic for me and for my dog. i traveled to the dakotas; wisconsin; illinois and ohio with this car. i am in general a good care-taker: fixed everything needs to be fixed and replaced parts that need to be replaced. this is also a good car for diy people like me (just replaced the rear bumper cover). tranny was completely replaced 10k miles ago. i just came from a 4th of july weekend trip to chicago and had zero problems (i like to drive). serpentine belt also recently serviced.#uses regular gas (i use mixtures with higher quality gas); so filling in is not expensive. spare parts are easy to find (and there are still a ton of this model car roaming the roads here and there). compare to others here in craiglist.#i moved recently to philly from montana with this car. my ford escape is fire-highway tested for 10000 miles by me and did not have any issues. i recently redid the transmission which is; admittedly; design issue for this car (google it). i have the bills to demonstrate that it is less than 8k miles old. how many other can say the same?#i am also adding a few extras for whomever offers the full price (or close to it): i put a pioneer stereo to plug my ipod and have my phone connected when duty calls (it has a free-hand bluetooth system). a sun shade in decent condition; and i am also adding a sherpak cargo bag for the roof that goes with the car (https://www.rei.com/product/677675/sherpak-go-15-roof-bag).#i have seen here in craiglist similar cars for less price or similar price. i do not think they compare to mine: higher mileage; dubious transmission status; not road tested; and certainly no extras.#in a few words; i do think this is a good deal for you provided that you are; in fact; someone who likes to drive; who does not care for snow or rain; that wants to haul equipment; and wants the freedom and the savings provided by it.#i just got the car registered in pa; so i am ready to show it after july 11th. i intend to sell before august. i can also take it to you for inspection if you are a serious buyer and not intending to hassle with the price. otherwise; i live close to center city so we could make an appointment for you to check it out.#let me know if you have any answers#thanks!#luis
